name: translations
description: Translations for the integreat frontend projects

scripts.export:ods:translations: yarn manage convert translations.json translations-csv csv && ./tools/csv-to-ods translations-csv translations-ods && rm -rf translations-csv
scripts.export:ods:override-malte: yarn manage convert override-translations/malte.json malte-csv csv && ./tools/csv-to-ods malte-csv malte-ods && rm -rf malte-csv
scripts.export:ods:override-aschaffenburg: yarn manage convert override-translations/aschaffenburg.json aschaffenburg-csv csv && ./tools/csv-to-ods aschaffenburg-csv aschaffenburg-ods && rm -rf aschaffenburg-csv
scripts.import:ods:translations: ./tools/ods-to-csv translations-ods translations-csv && yarn manage convert translations-csv translations.json json && rm -rf translations-csv
scripts.import:ods:override-malte: ./tools/ods-to-csv malte-ods malte-csv && yarn manage convert malte-csv override-translations/malte.json json&& rm -rf malte-csv
scripts.import:ods:override-aschaffenburg: ./tools/ods-to-csv aschaffenburg-ods aschaffenburg-csv && yarn manage convert aschaffenburg-csv override-translations/aschaffenburg.json json && rm -rf aschaffenburg-csv
